message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14000. This is a high-quality item that I believe would be a great addition to your collection, and I think we've found a price that reflects its value while being fair to both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am currently working within a budget of $12000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate a price closer to this amount?
